summary: The bill, titled the "Common-Sense Law Enforcement and Accountability Now in DC Act" (CLEAN DC Act), proposes to repeal the Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Amendment Act of 2022 enacted by the District of Columbia Council. This would effectively restore or revive any laws amended or repealed by the 2022 Act to their pre-existing state. The bill was introduced by Mr. Clyde and numerous cosponsors in the House of Representatives.
